       theme: cerulean
---

We often make plots in data science.

```{r include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
```


```{r}
df_plot <-
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(500, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(500)
  )
```


```{r}
df_plot |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + geom_point(color = "#6a5acd")
```
